short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search products on your favorite online shopping sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop Hub will allow you to search any product on popular online shopping websites.
If you ever come across a particular product on any website and you wish to do a quick price check on popular shopping websites, simply select the product name and do a right click and click on the option 'Search this item'. 

Please contact on nehanaik9029@gmail.com for any questions or comments.
